Description: Collect peanut butter
Wash your hands with soap and water for 20 seconds to ensure cleanliness.
Clear a clean
Order Number: flat surface like a kitchen counter for assembly.

Description: Open the bag of sliced bread and take out two slices.
Place the two slices of bread side by side on a plate.
Twist the lid of the peanut butter jar counterclockwise to open it.
Use the butter knife to scoop a tablespoon of peanut butter from the jar.
Spread the peanut butter evenly on one side of one bread slice.
Wipe the knife clean with a napkin to avoid mixing flavors.
Twist the lid of the jelly jar counterclockwise to open it.
Use a spoon to scoop a tablespoon of jelly from the jar.
Spread the jelly evenly on one side of the other bread slice.
Place the peanut butter slice on top of the jelly slice
Adjust the slices so the edges of the bread line up neatly.
Use the butter knife to cut the sandwich diagonally into two triangles.
Check that the sandwich looks even and well-assembled.
Place the sandwich triangles on a clean plate for serving.
Wipe down the counter and put away unused ingredients.
Wash the knife and spoon with soap and water.
Sit down and enjoy your peanut butter and jelly sandwich!
